Popular Posts

  • GTFO
    GTFO is an upcoming first-person shooter action survival horror cooperative game developed by Swedish indie studio 10 Chambers Collective. GTFO is scheduled for release in 2019 for Microsoft Windows.
  • Dying light 2
    Dying Light 2 is an upcoming survival horror action role-playing game developed by Techland and published by Techland Publishing. The game will be released for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One in early 2020, and is the sequel to 2015's Dying Light.
  • Call of Duty: Modern Warfare
    Call of Duty: Modern Warfare is an upcoming first-person shooter video game that is being developed by Infinity Ward and published by Activision. It will serve as the sixteenth overall installment in the Call of Duty series as well as a "soft reboot" of the Modern Warfare sub-series.
  • Resident Evil 2
    Resident Evil 2 is a survival horror game developed and published by Capcom. Players control police officer Leon S. Kennedy and college student Claire Redfield as they attempt to escape from Raccoon City during a zombie apocalypse.
